title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 544.3 - Filing of proposed record units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 544.3 - Filing of proposed record units

State Regulations

Every water-works corporation affected by this Part shall
file on or before February 1, 1937 a statement setting forth the continuing
property record units proposed to be used in its continuing property
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
544.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
